title: Question about brochure
content:
i was working on the brochures for my class....and i wonder should i justified the texts or not....   
   
could u give me some idea...please....thnkz..
author: ngoc723

comments.content: this design decision is related to some of your other design decisions, e.g., what's the length of your line of type, or measure? if a column's narrow, left alignment with a ragged right will likely be better. what's the brochure about? justified text is sometimes thought of as more "conservative," as a generalization. hope this helps, good luck.
